title: Lyrique: Blessing for Efforts
description: A posthumous edition of a vertically oriented, rectangular, multicolored abstract woodblock print produced by the artist's son, Onchi Kunio (1920-2001); the original published in the Japanese art journal "Tsukuhae" [Moonglow], volume VI, no. 1, 1915 (Taisho 4).
dimensions:
paper: H. 27.8 x W. 21.8 cm (10 15/16 x 8 9/16 in.)
printed image: H. 13.4 x W. 9.6 cm (5 1/4 x 3 3/4 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Elizabeth and Neil Swinton
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
